reviews.review: Fun to play, no nonsense, exciting, great game. 5/5 in my book. Will get your heart thumping at times!

Dead by Daylight - survival хоррор, в котором участвуют убийца и четверо выживших. Основная цель выживших - сбежать из игрового поля, с помощью ремонта генераторов и спасения своих камрадов. Пока вы будете "спокойненько" чинить генераторы, ваши товарищи будут висеть на крюках). В такие моменты, нужно бежать так, будто приспичило в комнату раздумий. А тем временем, пока проходит спасательная операция, ман готов вас пырнуть в спину. И конечно же, найдутся те люди, которые любыми способами попытаются обезопасить свой пердак.
Co tu dużo mówić fajna giera.
Dead by Daylight is the best multiplayer horror experience i had so far.

2年以上ゲーム実況を見ていて，昨年末にセールで購入しました．
実況を見ていたこともあり，ゲーム内容やキャラの違いなども把握していたため，すぐに楽しくプレイすることができました．
そのため，初見でゲームを購入すると戸惑う場面が多々あると思います．その際には実況を見て学んだり，気を長くしてプレイ出来たら楽しいのかなと個人的に思います．

This game looks like a fun horror-movie L4D clone but plays like a hyper-competitive shooter. It's a crappy bait-and-switch to pull on the unsuspecting horror fan. The theme is pasted on and the basic gameplay isn't good enough to make it worth pushing on through the steep as hell learning curve and high skill floor unless your'e a weird psycho who gets their rocks off from torturing randoms on the internet. The game's systems are confusing, poorly explained and gratuitously intricate. I did not enjoy my three hours with this game.

The theme is barely pasted on. It doesn't feel like a horror film AT ALL. The environments are junk randomly dropped in a higgledy-piggledy mess with no real sense of being a real place. Gameplay feels like one giant shitty exploit because the core mechanics just SUCK. Even when you can interact with the junk environment, why would you? You can hide in a locker, but the killer sees it automatically... so you learn quickly to avoid the lockers entirely. So instead of using the objects for their intended purpose, you just spend all your time doing twitchy nonsense like running in circles around a bit of wall or rock until the killer gets bored. More Benny Hill than Silent Hill.

The skill floor is very high, the game does nothing to prepare you for it. You fail so often and so comprehensively that you can't even really figure out what you did wrong (because everything you try is wrong) or what you might do right (because there is zero information on how to improve). It's a terrible sign when the "basic" guides on Steam contain privileged terms that a noob can't understand without a glossary, and the guides that noobs can understand on the other parts of the internet tell you nothing useful about playing the game.

There's an experiment where they put a rat on an electrified floor so it constantly gets electric shocks, and then when they put the same rat in a chamber with a patch of floor that isn't electrified and the rat could just WALK OVER TO to be safe and comfortable, the rat just lies there and takes the shocks. It's called 'learned helplessness' and that's how I feel as a survivor in this game. I don't feel like I'm playing a game, I feel like I'm just being tortured randomly. 

Lastly, the meta-systems are baffling. there's three forms of currency and none of them are explained. You have a player level, a character level, and also a player ranking... why? There are a million perks that clog your loadout screen, with no filters or sorting, and loadout seems to be a core part of the game. It's really hard to tell what any of the consumables do because they use game terms that are never explained and you don't understand (with no tooltips) and then you die anyway and the consumable is used up. It's impossible to figure out why or when you should use a particular consumable on any given map, since you choose to use it before the killer is revealed.

Even the positive reviews say the game is mostly frustrating, and not in a good way. Make of that what you will. Don't buy this game. L4D does horror better, Phasmophobia does scary better, and if you get your self-worth from dominating other people with your fast twitch muscle fibres on the internet, play Valorant or  CSGO. Dead By Daylight is a niche game without a niche.

в те времена когда она только вышла это была замечательная игра , помню я те времена.... я тогда только приобрел себе железо и это было первое во что мои друзья захотели поиграть и начали звать меня , мы все купили в один вечер сие чудо (по тогдашним меркам) было весело играть , ловить скримеры , с потом выигрывать катки , тогда все было чудно но в процессе с выходом разных нововведений слишком сильно стал резаться баланс не в пользу выживших , мне то в принципе более менее нормально еще игралось но это дело все только усугублялось и в процессе вышло так что нужно быть очень скиловым что выиграть , касаемо новичков или просто тех кто без перков и предметов хороших , шансов явно нету особенно против донатных маньяков , а те приколы когда хост с херовым соединением и в катке у маньяка все замечательно а вы лагаете от чего в процессе вообще сливаете игру , я уверен что даже баг с медсестрой где она всех видит и блинкуется через всю карту не по фиксили , вообщем в данном её виде я не рекомендую играть в это , это лишь мое мнение как человека который наблюдал её развитие , вам нравится играйте я лишь предупреждаю что если купить хотите подумайте о том что порок вхождения слишком высок в том плане что без ничего будут одни сливы пока хоть что то не накопится и хрен вы кого так переиграете

The only horror game that actually incentivises you to play either as an ethnic person or a woman because you get either the minority perk status or the estrogen hormone perk effects.
Face camped by buba every game, would recommend 10/10 if you want a relaxing evening.

Play if you can handle being injected with a concoction of aids and cancer rolled into one. Between terrible balancing with the perk system both survivor and killer side mixed together with the worst matchmaking system I have ever seen in a video game makes this an experience that makes you wonder what the hell you're even playing for.

Beta was good, when Killers were scary and the game was balanced.

Now, it's garbage. Way too easy for starters, like getting your hand held along the way as a survivor. Just about a dozen perks that break the game in your favor. Never feel the need to run away when you match the Killer's speed or can run them around the same garbage for hours.

Outside of an armada of pay-to-access content, and some b.s. cosmetic crap, this game really doesn't have much more than it was released with.

It's crazy to see that this hand-full-of-ass hasn't flopped yet, but it's only real competition WAS Friday the 13th right? I haven't heard anything about that since it's launch either.

It's like a deadly game of hide and go seek. There are unique mechanics for killers as well as survivors, and every match is different. As a fan of the horror genre, this is definitely one of the [b]best[/b] multiplayer games ever. Wildly engaging and addicting.
